content:
# The error indicates that I do not have any coal left in my inventory, which prevents me from inserting it into the new furnace for fuel. Let's quickly verify my inventory again to confirm the situation.

print(f"Current Inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Verify the current inventory.

# Since I have no coal left, I will need to gather more from the nearest coal resource patch to continue the smelting process. 
# I will find the nearest coal location and extract some.

coal_position = nearest(Resource.Coal)  # Find the nearest coal patch
move_to(coal_position)  # Move to the coal position
harvest_resource(coal_position, quantity=10)  # Harvest some coal

# After harvesting new coal, I will check the updated inventory again.
print(f"Inventory updated to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Verify the inventory after harvesting coal.
